requirements.summary: Update seed functionality to populate 30 pre-defined exercises with correct names, equipment types, and muscle groups
acceptanceCriteria: The seed button in ExerciseLibrary triggers creation of all 30 exercises
Exercises appear in the library after seeding with proper filtering capabilities
No duplicate exercises are created if seed is triggered multiple times

file_operations.description: Update the seedExercises function to replace the existing sample exercises with the 30 exercises specified in the BuildRequest. Include all exercises with their exact names (preserving capitalization and special characters), correct equipment types (Free Weight, Machine, Dumbbell, Cable), and muscle groups (lower body, chest, back, shoulders, biceps, triceps, core). Implement duplicate prevention by checking if exercises already exist before creating them.
